summary: Just a huge player home with lots of storage and room for followers, children, and horses.
descriptionHtml:
A huge estate on the road to Whiterun. Set high up on a cliff with beautiful views, tons of storage and room for plenty of followers and children.

The player has their own bedroom, while children and followers will sleep and hang out in the manor house. With an extensive kitchen and alchemy area just below, and a cave deep under the ground, making use of the natural lava flows for a blacksmithing and crafting cave. The mod also features a huge bathhouse and sauna, with water being heated by the lava flows under the mountain. Of course, the mod also includes a secret library and museum for all of the Dragonborn's treasures and displays.

And, what's a Fera's mod without custom textures! Goats, horses, chickens, cows and more are unique and have custom textures.
author: Feradiera
